description:
Turn your EXO gear hauling system into a sturdy tabletop in mere seconds. Road-trip lunch breaks, a work surface for tinkering or an evening of cards, the possibilities are endless.

  • Attaches to the EXO SwingBase or EXO TopShelf using a tool-free cleat system
  • Fits inside EXO GearLocker or EXO GearWarrior
  • Not intended as a food cutting surface
  • Includes a protective storage bag
  • Dimension: 125 x 43 cm
name: Yakima Exo BackDeck
